message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $15000. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $12000 for the product, which is a significant discount from your original price. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's features and benefits. I'm eager to hear your thoughts on this counteroffer.
